alert.note: Alert for Itawamba (Mississippi) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Memphis (Western Tennessee, Eastern Arkansas and Northern Mississippi)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued June 14 at 11:54AM CDT until June 14 at 12:30PM CDT by NWS Memphis
info.description: The National Weather Service in Memphis has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Northern Itawamba County in northeastern Mississippi... * Until 1230 PM CDT. * At 1154 AM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Sandy Springs, or 8 miles north of Fulton, moving southeast at 50 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Fulton, Mantachie, Tremont, Fairview, Sandy Springs, Clay, Eastman and Bounds Crossroads. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
